TopicTitle: where do i put add-on requests now?

Articles.Content:
since i have just witnessed the new modded, unmodded support threads and the disappearance of the old addon requests and support thread, i ask where do i put add-on requests now?

do i put it in suggestions or what?
I would put them in the General Addon Affairs forum since no other locations make much sense for that.
^ I've updated the description of the General Add-on Affairs forum to reflect the change
